attributes.action: Stop the government from changing jury trial formats
attributes.additional_details:
By changing things in this way it will only exasperate the prison overcrowding or it will let criminals back onto our streets.
More emphasis should be on the efficiency and affectivity of the system as it stands.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not remove trial by jury for certain cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751480
